title: The Pale Man | AHS: Double Feature - Episode 1: "Cape Fear" (HQ Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: Times have been rough for Jeffree Star lol...
I feel like in the end they'll combine both stories, it may be a twist!! Maybe both stories are written by one of the authors or something.
where do these pale men get their coats? Love the shoulder pads.
The eerie music makes it 10x more terrifying
They going to put aliens in this?  I think it's interesting enough just with the creatures. Hopefully the script won't get too crazy.
description: "Cape Fear", the season premiere of American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) - written by Ryan Murphy & Brad Falchuk, directed by John J. Gray - stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television.
